about_the_game:
[Game Character]

Keon
A quick-tempered Chuunibyou sufferer, she always puts on an air of superiority and bursts into a childlike tantrum whenever she is poked and prodded.

CV：天知遙
Dee
Emotional, knowing girl who describes everything in the world based on her imagination. Life is like a play, and a play is like a life, and she will attribute everything around her to the script, extrapolating the future, as well as pushing the story to a dramatic conclusion.

CV：西瓜すいか
A
Nervous, impulsive and capricious, she always drops the ball on things. It is this character that makes her always screw up everything regardless of the consequences. Wherever she goes, chaos and commotion come as expected.

CV：乙倉ゅい
S
She has no interest in the world, as if the only meaning of life for her is to breathe. She is dissatisfied with what she sees in her eyes, and this dissatisfaction builds up to a point where she reaches a point of complete insanity.

Z
She may look dull on the outside, but in reality she is beyond the realm of human emotion. She is omniscient and omnipotent, and no ethical or worldly concepts can limit her behavior. She is like a machine that believes in doing whatever it takes to achieve its goals, but sometimes shows human emotions.

CV：恋鈴桃歌

[Game Plot]

Maybe I was destined to become a permanent employee of the King of Hell in this life, and then spend the rest of my life happily with beautiful women. However, I was transported to another world because I mistakenly touched a button.
When I arrived in this world, in front of my eyes were two women who were changing their clothes and stroking each other's bodies. Because of my arrival, their movements suddenly stopped ......
"Peeping Tom!" What kind of anticlimactic opening is this?
Future technology? Time travelers? The Mobile Unit? An amusement park on the verge of bankruptcy? What kind of nonsense is this?
Let's rebuild the amusement park with Keon, a genius girl, and Dee, a secretarial girls in professional attire!! Find a way to get back.
Wait a minute. Why am I working at an amusement park when I'm in another world?


【Game Features】


◇5 female characters are dubbed in Japanese
◇5 Female Characters for H and dominating
◇4KHigh Quality Dynamic HCGs
◇17 Plot CGs
◇One-handed operation, smooth experience
◇Steamdeck touch screen operation is now supported
◇Character dressing + character live 2d interaction
◇A variety of gameplay Visual Novel + Simulation Management + 2d Horizontal Shooting.



Voice Recording：＠FAUNAS_ASMR
Translate Assistant：＠FAUNAS_ASMR
Japanese Corrector：ツヅル

highlighted.name: Need a background on the outside.
be a bully under the protection of a powerful person

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, All characters are over 20 years old.
Our game does not include such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, or suicide.
Contains mild BDSM

detailed_description:
[Game Character]

Keon
A quick-tempered Chuunibyou sufferer, she always puts on an air of superiority and bursts into a childlike tantrum whenever she is poked and prodded.

CV：天知遙

Emotional, knowing girl who describes everything in the world based on her imagination. Life is like a play, and a play is like a life, and she will attribute everything around her to the script, extrapolating the future, as well as pushing the story to a dramatic conclusion.

Nervous, impulsive and capricious, she always drops the ball on things. It is this character that makes her always screw up everything regardless of the consequences. Wherever she goes, chaos and commotion come as expected.

She has no interest in the world, as if the only meaning of life for her is to breathe. She is dissatisfied with what she sees in her eyes, and this dissatisfaction builds up to a point where she reaches a point of complete insanity.

She may look dull on the outside, but in reality she is beyond the realm of human emotion. She is omniscient and omnipotent, and no ethical or worldly concepts can limit her behavior. She is like a machine that believes in doing whatever it takes to achieve its goals, but sometimes shows human emotions.

[Game Plot]

Maybe I was destined to become a permanent employee of the King of Hell in this life, and then spend the rest of my life happily with beautiful women. However, I was transported to another world because I mistakenly touched a button.
When I arrived in this world, in front of my eyes were two women who were changing their clothes and stroking each other's bodies. Because of my arrival, their movements suddenly stopped ......
"Peeping Tom!" What kind of anticlimactic opening is this?
Future technology? Time travelers? The Mobile Unit? An amusement park on the verge of bankruptcy? What kind of nonsense is this?
Let's rebuild the amusement park with Keon, a genius girl, and Dee, a secretarial girls in professional attire!! Find a way to get back.
Wait a minute. Why am I working at an amusement park when I'm in another world?

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOs
  • Processor: m1 m2 or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOs
  • Processor: m1 m2 or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 or better
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In

name: Fantasy Amusement Park II

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 or better
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built In
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.5 or better
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: The gameplay of the game includes visual novel +2D horizontal version shooting. The main story is about the male protagonist traveling to the future world, helping the female protagonist run the amusement park, solving disasters in the future city, and returning to the original world.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Ukrainian, Russian, Bulgarian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support
